text: Sergio Pintor (16 November 1937 – 27 December 2020) was an Italian Roman Catholic prelate. He was an Diocesan Bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Ozieri from 2006 to 2012.Bishop Sergio Pintor Pintor was born in Oristano, Italy. In 1961, he became a priest. Pintor died on 27 December 2020 in Ozieri, Italy at the age of 83.È morto a Oristano Sergio Pintor, vescovo emerito di Ozieri ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Sergio Pintor
